column2: Comes in a small square pink bucket. I have since lost the instruction book.

column1: Enough pieces to build several items without running out.
Mini figs are just two large bricks joined together, Mum, Dad, Baby and Parrot.
Easy to build, can make a building using the windows and doors.
i like the cute flowers with this set.

column2: d recommend this to buy for a child.
